doc:
Jessie Matthews https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jessie_Matthews 0 Jessie Matthews (11 March 1907 – 19 August 1981) was an English actress, dancer and singer of the 1920s and 1930s, whose career continued into the post-war period.After a string of hit stage musicals and films in the mid-1930s, Matthews developed a following in the USA, where she was dubbed "The Dancing Divinity". Her British studio was reluctant to let go of its biggest name, which resulted in offers for her to work in Hollywood being repeatedly rejected. Jessie_Matthews ( 11_March_1907 – 19_August_1981 ) was an_English_actress_,_dancer_and_singer of the_1920s_and_1930s , whose_career continued into the_post-war_period.After a_string of hit_stage_musicals and films in the_mid-1930s , Matthews developed a_following in the_USA , where she was_dubbed " The_Dancing_Divinity_" . Her_British_studio was reluctant to_let_go of its_biggest_name , which resulted in offers for her to_work in Hollywood being_repeatedly_rejected .
